fr.imt.ales.redoc.jarloader

Class JarLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.ClassLoader
      • java.security.SecureClassLoader
        • java.net.URLClassLoader
          • fr.imt.ales.redoc.jarloader.JarLoader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class JarLoader
extends java.net.URLClassLoader
    A class for loading java classes from jar/war archives
    Author:
    Alexandre Le Borgne

      • JarLoader

        public JarLoader(java.net.URL[] urls,
                 java.net.URL[] jarUrls)
        Parameterized constructor that allows to load not only jar/war archives
        Parameters:
        urls - should not be null
        jarUrls - specific jar/war URLs, should not be null

      • JarLoader

        public JarLoader(java.lang.String... paths)
          throws java.io.IOException
        Parameterized constructor for loading only jar/war archives
        Parameters:
        paths - The array that contains paths of the directories where to find jar/war archives
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs when opening the directory
